crosschainBurn(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the bridge contract.

crosschainMint(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the bridge contract or messenger.

crosschainBurn(address,uint256).notice: Burns tokens from an address for cross-chain transfer.

crosschainMint(address,uint256).notice: Mints tokens to an address from cross-chain transfer.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mint initial supply to an address.
